text: qpr have told loic remy to make a quick decision on his future following the collapse of his move to liverpool . the french frontman 's dream switch to anfield fell through on sunday due to concerns over the 27-year-old 's fitness . video : scroll down to see harry redknapp on loic remy 's livepool move collapsing . uncertain future : qpr striker loic remy . remy is due to report back to training with the hoops at the weekend and redknapp has urged the former marseille forward to commit himself to the west londoners . ` we need to know whether he 's going to stay or not , because we ca n't be losing him on transfer deadline day or something and then not have a striker , ' said the loftus road chief . ` if he 's going to stay we need that commitment now and we need to get him going , get him fit and get him playing . ' time off : remy was given an extended break after the world cup .
summary: frenchman in limbo after liverpool move collapses due to medical concerns .   remy due to report back to pre-season training at the weekend .   redknapp wants forward to commit his future to loftus road club .
